name: Other (itch)
description:
Other follows the story of Makoto, a student in a village preparing for the day that he will be sacrificed to the mysterious Room of One.

In his final three days, Makoto must complete a sacred rite with the help of his fellow villagers, with each of whom he has one final chance to say goodbye.

Made in RPGMaker VX Ace in three days for Ludum Dare 37.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement

- Run

Z/ - Interact

Credit & Thanks:

Art, Design & Narrative by Nathan C. Addison

Map Design & Scripting by Michael Bohea

Soundtrack by Kevin Sum

EDIT: For anyone stuck on the first day, when Hisato says West, what he really means is East. The poor old fella gets confused sometimes!
